Table  1.Optimization of the reaction conditions.[a] [a] Unless otherwise noted, all reactions were carried out with1 a(0.2 mmol),2 a(0.3 mmol),nBu4NBr (0.1 M), MeCN/H2O (5 mL). [b] Yield of isolated product. [c] The dr was determined by1H NMR analysis (details in SI).
Scheme 1CaptionMethods for the construction of sulfoximidoyl-based molecules.

Scheme 2CaptionSubstrates scope of unsaturated sulfoximines and diselenides. Reaction conditions: undivided cell, carbon plate anode (1.5 cm×1.5 cm), Pt plate cathode (1.5 cm×1.5 cm),1 a(0.2 mmol),2 a(0.3 mmol),nBu4NBr (0.1 M), MeCN/H2O (5 mL), 4 mA at r. t. under air for 10 h.
